text: the mufredj is bathed in exceptional light
One last photo where they make the tanurs
a flock of Qabilis and children
the noble face who embodies the Orient
Salem as he spun the cotton
take a picture of the 4 brothers
child who is studying with his grandfather
I photographed the different stages of production
the welcome given us by Jews and Muslims
carrying a heavy load of sticks on her back
portrait of him surrounded by all his grandchildren and great-grandchildren
Jerhadi’s mother who prepares the dough for the rhourh
